Name: Mike Benbow
Job/Team Function: The Director of Standards and Quality is responsible for the directorate which leads on standards, quality assurance, risk management, operational training and performance data.

Name: Philip Geering
Job/Team Function: The Directorate was eliminated from the 1st of November 2010 as part of a restructure to achieve efficiencies. From 1st of November the director was on loan to the Home office to provide advice and support on relevant aspects of the Police Reform and Social Responsibility Bill.

Name: Moir Stewart
Job/Team Function: The Director of Investigations is responsible for the directorate which investigates the most serious complaints and allegations of misconduct against the police in England and Wales.

Name: Jane Furniss
Job/Team Function: The IPCC's Chief Executive is the IPCC's Accounting Officer and is accountable to the Home Office Principal Accounting Officer and to Parliament. She is responsible for running the organisation which supports the work of the Commission.

Name: Amanda Kelly
Job/Team Function: The Director of Business Services is responsible for running the directorate which provides Finance, Human Resources, Procurement, IT, Facilities Management and Legal services to the organisation. As well as assisting the organisation with policy development, press and public relations.

Name: David Knight
Job Title: Director Of Casework and Customer Services
Job/Team Function: The Director of Casework and Customer Services is responsible for the staff who make decisions on appeals made by members of the public, the Telephone Complaints Centre and the Freedom of Information team.
